alert.note: Alert for Ashland; Huron; Lorain; Medina; Richland (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 21 at 6:03PM EDT until May 21 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM EDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL RICHLAND...EASTERN HURON...SOUTHWESTERN MEDINA... NORTHERN ASHLAND AND SOUTHWESTERN LORAIN COUNTIES... At 603 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Wellington, or 15 miles north of Ashland, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Grafton, Wellington, New London, Savannah, Polk, Sullivan, Lagrange, Penfield, Pittsfield, Greenwich, Spencer, North Fairfield, Bailey Lakes, Rochester and Nova. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
